revised_title: The Formation and Growth of Ripple-Mark: A Study of Sand Ripples and Their Origin
tldr: The author investigates the formation and growth of ripple-mark on sandy shores, focusing on the initial starting point of ripples and their relation to water waves. Through experiments, the author demonstrates that oscillating water can create ripples on smooth and level sand without the need for chance irregularities. The study also reveals how existing ripples initiate new ones, forming a pattern of ripple-marked sand.
